title: 怎么卸载modloader
author: xyh2000
txt_content:
求高手啊！
卸掉modloader！
我想装上forge

replies.txt_content: 自己再下载个原版的minecraft.jar不就行了= =

replies.author: sjjklh
replies.txt_content: 安装modloader的过程中替换了大量原版文件，想卸载几乎没可能，建议重新自己下纯净minecraft.jar安装

replies.author: xyh2000
replies.txt_content: 那我怎么安装需要API支持的mod呢？
